status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d2bnb","text":"Transiently transfect FIP200 knockout HAP1 cells with pcDNA3.1 NAP1-EGFP (Addgene), or empty pcDNA3.1 vector as a negative control, using Lipofectamine 2000 (Thermo Fisher).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lvg5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"91k3c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d1u7a","text":"This cell line was selected as FIP200 deletion results in TBK1 hyperactivation and thus increased NAP1 phosphorylation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ks75","text":"After 48 h, collect the cells by trypsinization and wash the cell pellet with PBS once. Then, lyse the cells in lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f530d","text":"Lyse the samples for    . Then, clear the cell lysates by centrifugation at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3jtoe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"D4C7CAB0157E11EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D6D4FFD0157E11EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"20000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EF846D40157E11EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4blhu","text":"Determine the protein concentrations of the cleared protein lysates with the Pierce Detergent Compatible Bradford Assay Kit (23246, Thermo Fisher).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54mva","text":"For both samples, negative control and NAP1-EGFP lysates, incubate   of cell lysate    with   or GFP-Trap agarose beads (GTA-20, Chromotek).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12","error":false,"guid":"35910370157F11EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"4345C5A0157F11EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"47E8C0D0157F11EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qijk","text":"In the morning, wash the samples three times in lysis buffer. Then, resuspend the beads in protein loading dye, supplemented with 100 mM DTT. Finally, boil the samples for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":172,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":177,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0im6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3B4240B0158711EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3D83F350158711EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aijqc","text":"Load the samples on 4-12% SDS-PAGE gels (NP0322BOX, Thermo Fisher) with PageRuler Prestained protein marker (Thermo Fisher). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab64g","text":"After the run, stain the SDS-PAGE gel with Coomassie, fix for   in fixation solution, and destain it   in dH2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":101,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6jef4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"7FF998B0190C11EEA5197D7389C9919E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"75509E50158711EEB502ADBE6FE97AF9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ts4","text":"Cut the band corresponding to NAP1-EGFP from the gel with a fresh scalpel and submit for mass spectrometry analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
